mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_OUT_STOCK( id, out_code, out_status, apply_user_id, oper_user_id, renark, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{outCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{applyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{operUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{renark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

INSERT INTO T_OUT_STOCK( id, out_code, out_status, apply_user_id, oper_user_id, renark, create_time, update_time ) VALUES
( #{tOutStock.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tOutStock.outCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tOutStock.outStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tOutStock.applyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tOutStock.operUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tOutStock.renark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tOutStock.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tOutStock.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_OUT_STOCK SET id = #{id}, out_code = #{outCode}, out_status = #{outStatus}, apply_user_id = #{applyUserId}, oper_user_id = #{operUserId}, renark = #{renark}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
